name: Cheap Date
description: If you have had the wine and kinda liked it for what it is... you will like this. These flavors will be available October 6th at BCF.
author: Thadentman

reviews.text: I love the complements here, the added fruity complexity of Sangria, the way Oak Barrel can make Moscato actually taste much more like wine. A touch of cooling. But that is just way way way too much Moscato. Itâ€™s like drinking cheap wine through a dryer sheet filter. I think this might be a great recipe if the amount of Moscato was cut in half or less.
